title: Numbers Station UVB-76
lines: Since the late 70s, it hums on 4625 kHz.
Reports: voices cut in with codes.
Some say it moves. Others say it never did.
To this day, the purpose is unclear.

title: Ghost Towns With Dark Pasts
lines: Whole streets. Lights gone for years.
Bodie, California — doors still creak in the wind.
Centralia, Pennsylvania — fires below the roads.
Cairo, Illinois — empty blocks by two rivers.
Folks say the air keeps the stories.
